list.name: Default
list.comment:
Update Mapping Directory.
++++++++ New Python Version : update from 3.6.X to 3.7.X +++++++++
### Admin.py ###
+ Add filter qs for fields in models. + Remove save_formset method from RegularUserAdmin Class, Modified save_model
### Models.py ###
- Removed slug field from Image Class - Remove save_method from Image Class - Remove save_mehtod from Keyword Class - Added custom regex validation to Keyword.keyword
### Signals.py ###
+ Added new signal for update grammar file in post_delete keyword
### SpeechDetector.py ###
+ Added get_search function + Added set_keyword_spotted function
### Tasks.py ###
+ Added remove_keyword function
### Validator.py ###
+ Added new validatos to validate_keyword
### Views.py ###
+ In videoGallery view: Modified initial queryset + Added decode_speech function to Celery task queue + Modified matching string of image-menu + Modified matching string of Subir Vol, Bajar vol and menu principal
### Settings.py ###
+ Modified Allowed Host to ['*'] + Added support for Heroku deployment + Set up celery settings + Modified Login URL + Added Static root path to project

component.name: DjangoConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

task.summary: Deleted wav files. Added procfile for Heroku Deployment. Fixed video lightbox

Update Mapping Directory.
++++++++ New Python Version : update from 3.6.X to 3.7.X +++++++++
### Admin.py ###
+ Add filter qs for fields in models. + Remove save_formset method from RegularUserAdmin Class, Modified save_model
### Models.py ###
- Removed slug field from Image Class - Remove save_method from Image Class - Remove save_mehtod from Keyword Class - Added custom regex validation to Keyword.keyword
### Signals.py ###
+ Added new signal for update grammar file in post_delete keyword
### SpeechDetector.py ###
+ Added get_search function + Added set_keyword_spotted function
### Tasks.py ###
+ Added remove_keyword function
### Validator.py ###
+ Added new validatos to validate_keyword
### Views.py ###
+ In videoGallery view: Modified initial queryset + Added decode_speech function to Celery task queue + Modified matching string of image-menu + Modified matching string of Subir Vol, Bajar vol and menu principal
### Settings.py ###
+ Modified Allowed Host to ['*'] + Added support for Heroku deployment + Set up celery settings + Modified Login URL + Added Static root path to project

Estado del proyecto: preparado para usar SSL. Desplegado en www.ucopivoz.com
++++++++ New Python Version : update from 3.6.X to 3.7.X +++++++++
### Admin.py ###
+ Add filter qs for fields in models. + Remove save_formset method from RegularUserAdmin Class, Modified save_model
### Models.py ###
- Removed slug field from Image Class - Remove save_method from Image Class - Remove save_mehtod from Keyword Class - Added custom regex validation to Keyword.keyword
### Signals.py ###
+ Added new signal for update grammar file in post_delete keyword
### SpeechDetector.py ###
+ Added get_search function + Added set_keyword_spotted function
### Tasks.py ###
+ Added remove_keyword function
### Validator.py ###
+ Added new validatos to validate_keyword
### Views.py ###
+ In videoGallery view: Modified initial queryset + Added decode_speech function to Celery task queue + Modified matching string of image-menu + Modified matching string of Subir Vol, Bajar vol and menu principal
### Settings.py ###
+ Modified Allowed Host to ['*'] + Set up celery settings + Modified Login URL + Added Static root path to project + Disabled CORS security
### Admin.py ###
+ Added actions buttons to admin models. + Added checktick to Regular User to know if has rfid + Added n elements field to Album Admin
### Galeria/Models.py ###
+ Modified ImageField to optimize image uploads - Delete image_height and image_width from Album model
### Galeria/SpeechDetector.py ###
+ Modified model_dir and grammar path.
### Galeria/urls.py ###
+ Added ReadRFID url
### Galeria/views.py ###
+ Added messages + Temporally remove decode_speech from celery queue + Added function to get client IP + Added read rfid function
### views.py ###
+ Added rfid login function + Added messages
### Speech/model/grammar.jsgf ###
+ Added keyword "pivoz" to grammar
### Static/img ###
+ Modified brand logo
### templates/logged_out.html ###
+ Change logo
### templates/login.html ###
+ Modified logo + Added messages + Added hidden form to support rfid login + Added AJAX calls to get RFID from flask client

MESSAGE.value: Deleted wav files. Added procfile for Heroku Deployment. Fixed video lightbox
